```
Mister X: 35, 45, 51, 71, 78, 104, 106, 127, 132, 146, 166, 170, 172 (13 stations)

```
```
Number of taxi tickets: 57

Number of underground tickets: 23
Number of black tickets: 5
Number of double-move tickets: 3
```
